meta.title: Assistant for No Man's Sky
meta.description: Available on the Google Play and Apple App Store. Get Crafting, Refining and Cooking Recipes for the game No Man's Sky!!

assistantAppsMeta.title: Assistant Apps by Kurt Lourens
assistantAppsMeta.description: Home page of the Assistant Apps. Get the apps on Google Play, Apple App Store and on the web

headers.name: Content-Security-Policy
headers.value: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'report-sample' www.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'report-sample' fonts.googleapis.com/css nmscd.github.io; img-src 'self' data: nmsassistant.com cdn.nmsassistant.com cdn.assistantapps.com static.wikia.nocookie.net i.imgur.com www.google-analytics.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com nmscd.github.io; manifest-src https://app.nmsassistant.com/manifest.json; connect-src app.nmsassistant.com api.nmsassistant.com api.assistantapps.com www.google-analytics.com; media-src 'self' stream.zenolive.com *.zeno.fm; base-uri 'self'; report-uri 'none'; form-action 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;

headers.name: X-Content-Security-Policy
headers.value: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'report-sample' www.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'report-sample' fonts.googleapis.com/css nmscd.github.io; img-src 'self' data: nmsassistant.com cdn.nmsassistant.com cdn.assistantapps.com static.wikia.nocookie.net i.imgur.com www.google-analytics.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com nmscd.github.io; manifest-src https://app.nmsassistant.com/manifest.json; connect-src app.nmsassistant.com api.nmsassistant.com api.assistantapps.com www.google-analytics.com; media-src 'self' stream.zenolive.com *.zeno.fm; base-uri 'self'; report-uri 'none'; form-action 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;

headers.name: X-WebKit-CSP
headers.value: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'report-sample' www.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'report-sample' fonts.googleapis.com/css nmscd.github.io; img-src 'self' data: nmsassistant.com cdn.nmsassistant.com cdn.assistantapps.com static.wikia.nocookie.net i.imgur.com www.google-analytics.com; font-src 'self' fonts.gstatic.com nmscd.github.io; manifest-src https://app.nmsassistant.com/manifest.json; connect-src app.nmsassistant.com api.nmsassistant.com api.assistantapps.com www.google-analytics.com; media-src 'self' stream.zenolive.com *.zeno.fm; base-uri 'self'; report-uri 'none'; form-action 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
